text: The Creek Fire was a large wildfire that started on September 4, 2020 near Shaver Lake, California. The fire burned 379,895 acres (153,738 ha) and was declared 100% contained on December 24, 2020. It became the largest single blaze in the state on September 23 after the fire reached to 290,000 acres. Category:2020 in California Category:Fires in California Category:September 2020 events
title: Creek Fire (2020)
